document.full_text: the american computer scientist john mccarthy -- who coined the phrase "artificial intelligence" -- predicted in 1961 that computing power may someday become a public utility, much like electricity or water.
document.title: is europe ready to put its data in the clouds?
lines_and_colors: the american computer scientist john mccarthy -- who coined the phrase "artificial intelligence" -- predicted in 1961 that computing power may someday become a public utility, much like electricity or water.
